column3: I think this makes sense. Although it would remove certain log output if people continue to use only `debug=net`. But IMO thats okay.\nI personally would prefer something like `debug=netverbose` instead of `net2`.\n

> I personally would prefer something like debug=netverbose instead of net2.

Agreed
@rebroad can you please update the name of the debug category, then we can get this merged.\n

`LogPrint("net", "dropmessages DROPPING SEND MESSAGE
");` at [line 2492](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/7654/files#diff-9a82240fe7dfe86564178691cc57f2f1R2492) should probably also be moved to the new category.

Also maybe out of scope for this PR but the debug logging around `"received getdata"` seems due for a cleanup.
